common.catchphrase:
I craft your tech landscape

from conception to execution

home.presentation:
Hi! I am Alexis, a freelance software developer and architect based in Luxembourg.



With over a decade of experience, I have spent 5 years as a solution architect and 7 years as a developer.



I specialize in full-stack development and architecture assignments. Additionally, I am also available to provide DevOps consulting and offer development training.



For any collaboration or inquiries, I invite you to schedule a meeting through HubSpot or contact me via the contact form.

experience.5: 5 years of XP as IT Solution Architect
experience.7: 7 years of XP as fullstack java developer

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: I provide a range of cross-functional services to your IT landscape.

service-development.title: Development
service-development.content:
Java/Spring/JEE: Crafting robust and scalable solutions tailored to your specific needs.



HTML/CSS/JS/React: Designing modern, responsive user interfaces for an optimal user experience.

service-architecture.title: Architecture
service-architecture.content:
Implementing personalized solutions to efficiently integrate technology into your information system.



Definition and design of optimal architectures for Java/Spring applications, ensuring performance and scalability.

service-cloud.title: Cloud
service-cloud.content:
Cloud Deployment: Maximizing your business flexibility and scalability with our tailored cloud solutions.



Migration: Smoothly transition your systems to the cloud, minimizing disruptions and costs.

service-devsecops.title: Dev(Sec)Ops
service-devsecops.content: Automate your workflows with advanced DevOps solutions for quick and reliable application and infrastructure deployment.

service-training.title: Training
service-training.content:
Comprehensive training on current technologies adapted to your needs.



Specialization in Java development, CI/CD methodologies, DevOps, best practices and more.

service-advisory.title: Advisory
service-advisory.content:
Proposing innovative technological solutions to address your challenges.



Impact analysis and strategic recommendations to align technology with your business goals.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: All the technologies I have had the chance to work with.

partners.title: Partners
partners.subtitle: All the companies for which I have worked.
